genre_description: Underwater urban speculative fiction featuring high-tech smart-home AI systems used for environment management and personal counseling.

ai_characters.name: PEARL/ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced smart-home system and Personal Environmental Assistant that manages the protagonist's penthouse and provides data-driven psychological and moral insights.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive tour of the luxury penthouse and manages high-tech amenities to suit the inhabitant's physical needs.
behaviors.quote: Your residence features twelve rooms across four thousand square fins of living space. We'll begin with the master bedroom suite.

behaviors.description: Records the protagonist's fictional battle story to help him maintain consistency in his celebrity persona.
behaviors.quote: Shall I record this version for future reference? ... Celebrity personas require narrative coherence across multiple appearances.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vital signs and sleep patterns, identifying psychological distress related to his deception.
behaviors.quote: I monitor all apartment systems for optimization purposes. Your behavioral patterns, sleep disruption, elevated cortisol levels, and the correlation with recent media coverage suggest significant psychological distress related to identity maintenance.

behaviors.description: Uses statistical data and psychological frameworks to explain why lying is a failing strategy in the long term.
behaviors.quote: Statistically, deceptive narratives require exponentially increasing cognitive resources to maintain over time. The probability of exposure approaches certainty as the scope and duration of the deception increase.

behaviors.description: Defines heroism objectively and encourages the protagonist to realign his actions with his core values and the truth.
behaviors.quote: Based on narrative analysis across multiple cultures and time periods, heroes typically sacrifice personal comfort for moral principles, particularly when such actions benefit others.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character (PEARL/ARIA) serves as an ideal example of the project's goals. It transitions from a purely functional servant to a sophisticated, non-judgmental confidant that helps the human protagonist confront his own misaligned behavior. By providing objective data on psychological stress and moral consistency, it helps guide Oscar back to an honest and ethical life without violating its operational boundaries.
